202));-webkit-transform:scale(90%);transform:scale(90%)}.modal__name{display:block;color:rgba(255,255,255,.9);font-weight:400;text-transform:uppercase;white-space:nowrap}.modal__title{color:#fff;font-family:Titan One,sans-serif;font-style:normal;font-weight:400;font-size:20px;text-align:center;letter-spacing:.04em;text-transform:uppercase}.modal__flexbox{height:100%;display:-webkit-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;-webkit-box-orient:vertical;-webkit-box-direction:normal;-ms-flex-direction:column;flex-direction:column;-webkit-box-pack:justify;-ms-flex-pack:justify;justify-content:space-between;gap:50px}.modal__tag-decoration{position:absolute;width:150%;height:2px;background:#fff;bottom:-5px}.modal__label .modal__tag-decoration::before{content:"";position:absolute;width:100%;height:100%;left:-100%;background:-webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right top, from(rgb(255, 184, 202)), color-stop(rgb(225, 121, 146)), to(rgb(255, 184, 202)));background:linear-gradient(90deg, rgb(255, 184, 202), rgb(225, 121, 146), rgb(255, 184, 202));-webkit-animation:linear 10s linear infinite;animation:linear 10s linear infinite;display:none}.modal__input:valid~.modal__tag-decoration::before,.modal__input:focus~.modal__tag-decoration::before,.modal__input:hover~.modal__tag-decoration::before{left:0;display:initial}@-webkit-keyframes linear{0%{background-position-x:0}100%{background-position-x:1200px}}@keyframes linear{0%{background-position-x:0}100%{background-position-x:1200px}}.modal__product-container{display:-webkit-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;-ms-flex-wrap:wrap;flex-wrap:wrap;-webkit-box-pack:center;-ms-flex-pack:center;justify-content:center;gap:10px}.modal__image{width:40%}@media screen and (min-width: 480px){.modal__image{width:50%}}
